functional_jobs.job_statement: When I am joining a new community group, I want to easily sign up and navigate the website/app, so I can quickly participate in events and feel a part of the community.
functional_jobs.current_solution: The sign-up process was straightforward and user-friendly.
functional_jobs.pain_points: The app lacks some functionalities, like easily contacting committee chairs if I cannot attend an event.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A seamless registration experience and easy access to committee contact information.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Users can register, navigate, and communicate regarding events without confusion.

functional_jobs.job_statement: When I want to participate in events, I want to find relevant events quickly, so I can manage my time and commitments effectively.
functional_jobs.current_solution: The website has a list and calendar view for events.
functional_jobs.pain_points: Finding specific events can be overwhelming due to the large number of activities and the lack of filtering options.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: An efficient way to filter or search for events based on my interests.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Users can easily filter events and find those relevant to their interests without excessive scrolling.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When I join a new group, I want to feel welcomed and engaged, so I can build connections and feel part of the community.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: The orientation and meet and greet events were helpful.
emotional_jobs.pain_points: The website/app does not feel very inviting or visually appealing.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A welcoming online experience that reflects the community spirit.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: Users report feeling engaged and excited about participating in events.

social_jobs.job_statement: When I participate in community events, I want to be perceived as an active member and contributor, so I can build my social reputation.
social_jobs.current_solution: Attending events and engaging with members.
social_jobs.pain_points: Difficulty in contacting organizers could hinder participation and visibility.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: Easily communicate with event organizers to confirm attendance or express interest.
social_jobs.success_criteria: Users feel recognized and valued within the community due to active participation.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When I have questions or need assistance, I want to quickly find help, so I can resolve issues without frustration.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Access to committee chairs' emails for direct communication.
supporting_jobs.pain_points: Finding the right contact information on the app is not straightforward.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: Clear access to support and resources when needed.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: Users can find help quickly and effectively address any issues they encounter.
